entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
